org.sonatype.restsimple.jaxrs.guice
Class RestSimpleJaxrsModule

java.lang.Object
  com.google.inject.AbstractModule
      com.google.inject.servlet.ServletModule
          org.sonatype.restsimple.jaxrs.guice.RestSimpleJaxrsModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.inject.Module, ServiceDefinitionModule
public class RestSimpleJaxrsModule
extends com.google.inject.servlet.ServletModule
implements ServiceDefinitionModule

Base class for deploying ServiceDefinition to a JAXRS implementation.

defineServices

public List<ServiceDefinition> defineServices(com.google.inject.Injector injector)
Return the a list of ServiceDefinition to generate. By default this method scan the classpath in search for class annotated with the @Service annotation, and search for method that returns an instance of ServiceDefinition
